named-query.name: AccountingType.findAll
named-query.query: select t from AccountingType t order by t.id

named-query.name: Organization.findAll
named-query.query: select t from Organization t order by t.id

named-query.name: Organization.findByBin
named-query.query: select t from Organization t where t.bin=:bin

named-query.name: CurrentTransType.findAll
named-query.query: select t from CurrentTransType t order by t.id

named-query.name: DataSource.findAll
named-query.query: select t from DataSource t order by t.id

named-query.name: EnergyNode.findAll
named-query.query: select t from EnergyNode t order by t.id

named-query.name: EnergySource.findAll
named-query.query: select t from EnergySource t order by t.id

named-query.name: EnergySourceType.findAll
named-query.query: select t from EnergySourceType t order by t.id

named-query.name: EnergyZone.findAll
named-query.query: select t from EnergyZone t order by t.id

named-query.name: Meter.findAll
named-query.query: select t from Meter t order by t.id

named-query.name: Meter.findByOrg
named-query.query: select t from Meter t where t.org.id in :orgList order by t.id

named-query.name: MeteringPoint.findAll
named-query.query: select t from MeteringPoint t order by t.id

named-query.name: MeteringPoint.findByOrg
named-query.query: select t from MeteringPoint t where t.org.id in :orgList order by t.id

named-query.name: MeteringPointType.findAll
named-query.query: select t from MeteringPointType t order by t.id

named-query.name: MeteringType.findAll
named-query.query: select t from MeteringType t order by t.id

named-query.name: MeterType.findAll
named-query.query: select t from MeterType t order by t.id

named-query.name: Region.findAll
named-query.query: select t from Region t order by t.id

named-query.name: Substation.findAll
named-query.query: select t from Substation t order by t.id

named-query.name: SubstationType.findAll
named-query.query: select t from SubstationType t order by t.id

named-query.name: Unit.findAll
named-query.query: select t from Unit t order by t.id

named-query.name: VoltageTransType.findAll
named-query.query: select t from VoltageTransType t order by t.id

named-query.name: Country.findAll
named-query.query: select t from Country t order by t.id

named-query.name: BusinessPartner.findAll
named-query.query: select t from BusinessPartner t order by t.id

named-query.name: BankAccount.findAll
named-query.query: select t from BusinessPartner t order by t.id

named-query.name: Bank.findAll
named-query.query: select t from Bank t order by t.id

named-query.name: VoltageClass.findAll
named-query.query: select t from VoltageClass t order by t.id

named-query.name: Reactor.findAll
named-query.query: select t from Reactor t order by t.id

named-query.name: Reactor.findByOrg
named-query.query: select t from Reactor t where t.org.id in :orgList order by t.id

named-query.name: PowerTransformer.findAll
named-query.query: select t from PowerTransformer t order by t.id

named-query.name: PowerTransformer.findByOrg
named-query.query: select t from PowerTransformer t where t.org.id in :orgList order by t.id

named-query.name: PowerLineType.findAll
named-query.query: select t from PowerLineType t order by t.id

named-query.name: PowerLine.findAll
named-query.query: select t from PowerLine t order by t.id

named-query.name: PowerLine.findByOrg
named-query.query: select distinct(t) from PowerLine t left join t.powerLineParts t1 where t1.org.id in :orgList order by t.id

named-query.name: EnergyDistrict.findAll
named-query.query: select t from EnergyDistrict t order by t.id

named-query.name: Content.findAll
named-query.query: select t from Content t order by t.id

named-query.name: ContentType.findAll
named-query.query: select t from ContentType t order by t.id
